sect1.title: KWallet-&kf5-version;

sect2.title: Installation of KWallet
sect2.para: Install KWallet by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$KF5_PREFIX \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -DLIB_INSTALL_DIR=lib \ -DBUILD_TESTING=OFF \ -DDBUS_INTERFACES_INSTALL_DIR=/usr/share/dbus-1/interfaces \ -DECM_MKSPECS_INSTALL_DIR=$KF5_PREFIX/lib/qt5/mkspecs/modules \ .. && make

sect2.para: This package does not come with a test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release: This switch is used to apply higher level of the compiler optimizations.
-DLIB_INSTALL_DIR=lib: This switch is used to get libraries to install to $KF5_PREFIX/lib instead of $KF5_PREFIX/lib64 on a 64 bit system.
-DBUILD_TESTING=OFF: This switch is used to prevent building test programs and libraries that are of no use to an end user.
-DDBUS_INTERFACES_INSTALL_DIR=/usr/share/dbus-1/interfaces: This switch is used to ensure that D-Bus interfaces files are installed in the correct location.
